html: I urge my colleagues to set aside any political games or partisan brinkmanship and come together and fully fund CHIP. The health of our children is at stake.
text: I urge my colleagues to set aside any political games or partisan brinkmanship and come together and fully fund CHIP. The health of our children is at stake.

html: Families should not be worried about losing coverage for their children. And the fact this Congress cannot muster the ability to pass a long-term extension to CHIP funding is confounding to say the least.
text:
Families should not be worried about losing coverage for their children. 
And the fact this Congress cannot muster the ability to pass a long-term extension to CHIP funding is confounding to say the least.

html: Around 85,000 Iowa children rely on CHIP for their health. If we don’t act families and children will suffer. This is not a Republican issue or a Democrat issue, and we must pass a solution together.
text: Around 85,000 Iowa children rely on CHIP for their health. If we don’t act families and children will suffer. This is not a Republican issue or a Democrat issue, and we must pass a solution together.
